t:
My mom forced me to be a doctor.
She used to tell, “Everyone wants to marry a MAN in a white coat”.

I never had the heart to tell her...



    ‘So do I’.
c:
Don't be afraid to come out as part of LGBTQIA. The closet is for monsters, and you aren't one.



#doctor #whitecoat #mom #marriage #lgbt #lgbtrights #lgbtq #lgbtqia
